key_risks: Cybersecurity threats and potential data breaches
Regulatory and compliance risks in a highly regulated industry
Legal and financial issues, including CFPB action and APP scam losses
Competitive pressures from major fintech rivals
Dependence on key markets (North America and Europe)
controversies: CFPB action for improperly processing $2.3 billion in mortgage payments
Projected APP scam losses reaching $7.6 billion by 2028
environmental_issues: Focus on reducing carbon footprint aligns with ESG factors, but no significant environmental controversies reported
social_issues: Updated vendor contract templates to address modern slavery and human trafficking
governance_issues: Moderate leverage indicated by debt-to-equity ratio (0.72)
Potential vulnerabilities in data handling practices highlighted by CFPB action
